- [93mOrganometallic[0m [93mchemistry[0m: From [93mstereochemistry[0m to [93mcatalysis[0m to [93mnanochemistry[0m
- [93mEnantioselective[0m [93mcopper[0m-[93mcatalysed[0m [93mdefluorinative[0m [93malkylation[0m of [93mpolyfluoroarenes[0m with [93malkenes[0m and [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mdienes[0m.: [93mDespite[0m [93mimpressive[0m [93madvances[0m in the [93mfield[0m of [93mdefluorinative[0m [93malkylation[0m of [93mpolyfluoroarenes[0m, the [93mcorresponding[0m [93masymmetric[0m [93mcounterpart[0m [93mhas[0m [93mremained[0m a [93mformidable[0m [93mchallenge[0m. [93mHerein[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mpresent[0m the [93mfirst[0m [93mexample[0m of [93masymmetric[0m [93mdefluorinative[0m [93malkylation[0m of [93mpolyfluoroarenes[0m with [93mreadily[0m [93maccessible[0m [93malkenes[0m, [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mdienes[0m, and even ( [93mZ[0m / [93mE[0m )-[93mmixed[0m [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mdienes[0m as [93mpotential[0m [93mnucleophiles[0m in the [93mpresence[0m of a [93mchiral[0m [93mCuH[0m [93mcatalyst[0m, [93mavoiding[0m the [93mconventional[0m [93mutilization[0m of [93mhighly[0m [93mreactive[0m [93morganometallics[0m. - [93mFundamentals[0m of [93mMolecular[0m [93mCatalysis[0m
- [93mOrganometallic[0m [93mchemistry[0m and [93mcatalysis[0m
- [93mOlefin[0m [93mmetathesis[0m of [93mphospholipids[0m by [93mRuthenium[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcatalysts[0m in [93msolution[0m and on [93mliposomes[0m under [93mbiologically[0m [93mrelevant[0m [93mconditions[0m.: The [93mlast[0m [93mdecade[0m [93mhas[0m [93mseen[0m a [93mlot[0m of [93minterest[0m in [93mclassical[0m [93morganometallic[0m [93mcatalysis[0m [93mperformed[0m [93mintracellularly[0m, or at [93mleast[0m under [93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m ([93m37[0m °[93mC[0m, [93mair[0m, [93mwater[0m). [93mOne[0m [93msuch[0m [93mclassical[0m [93mreaction[0m is [93molefin[0m [93mmetathesis[0m ([93mOM[0m), which is [93mextremely[0m [93mcommon[0m in [93mpreparative[0m [93morganic[0m [93mchemistry[0m, [93mhowever[0m under [93mnon[0m-[93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m ([93mesp[0m. [93morganic[0m [93msolvents[0m). For in [93mvivo[0m [93mapplications[0m, [93mboth[0m [93mprokaryotic[0m and [93meukaryotic[0m [93mapplications[0m [93mwould[0m [93mrequire[0m the [93mpassage[0m of the [93mOM[0m [93mcatalyst[0m through the [93mcell[0m [93mmembrane[0m, which [93malready[0m [93mcontains[0m [93munsaturated[0m [93molefins[0m and [93mthus[0m [93mpotential[0m [93msubstrates[0m for [93mOM[0m. This [93mwork[0m [93mfocuses[0m on the [93mquestion[0m [93mwhether[0m [93mOM[0m is [93mcatalysed[0m in [93mmembranes[0m [93mcontaining[0m [93munsaturated[0m [93mphospholipids[0m. [93mInitial[0m [93mexperiments[0m with the [93m2nd[0m [93mgeneration[0m [93mHoveyda[0m-[93mGrubbs[0m [93mcatalyst[0m ([93mHGII[0m) [93mshowed[0m [93mself[0m-[93mmetathesis[0m of the [93mmembrane[0m-[93mforming[0m [93mphospholipids[0m [93mPOPE[0m, [93mPOPC[0m, and [93mPOPG[0m, while [93mapproximating[0m [93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m in [93msolution[0m ([93m37[0m °[93mC[0m, [93mair[0m, [93mneutral[0m [93mpH[0m) with [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversions[0m up to [93m58[0m%. [93mSubsequent[0m [93mexperiments[0m with [93mDOPC[0m in [93mlarge[0m [93munilamellar[0m [93mvesicles[0m ([93mLUVs[0m) and in [93msolution[0m [93mincluded[0m a [93mPEGylated[0m ([93mfeaturing[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mwater[0m [93msolubility[0m) and a [93mpalmitoylated[0m (with [93mincreased[0m [93mmembrane[0m [93mmobility[0m) [93mHGII[0m [93mderivative[0m. [93mBoth[0m were [93msuccessfully[0m [93msynthesised[0m [93mbeforehand[0m and [93mcomprehensively[0m [93mcharacterized[0m. [93mMembrane[0m [93mlocalisation[0m of the [93mcatalysts[0m was [93mevaluated[0m [93mvia[0m [93msize[0m [93mexclusion[0m [93mchromatography[0m ([93mSEC[0m) [93mfollowed[0m by [93mICP[0m-[93mMS[0m. [93mProduct[0m [93manalysis[0m of [93mOM[0m was [93mcarried[0m out after [93mone[0m [93mhour[0m and [93m24[0m [93mh[0m, [93mrespectively[0m, [93mvia[0m [93mNMR[0m, [93mTLC[0m, and [93mLC[0m-[93mMS[0m. The [93mintra[0m- and [93mintermolecular[0m [93mOM[0m [93mproducts[0m of [93mDOPC[0m were [93midentified[0m. [93mFirst[0m, [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversion[0m was [93msignificantly[0m [93mdiminished[0m in the [93mvesicles[0m, [93mhowever[0m, the [93mequilibrium[0m [93mstate[0m in [93mvesicles[0m was [93mreached[0m in [93mmuch[0m [93mless[0m [93mtime[0m [93mcompared[0m to [93msolution[0m ([93m1[0m [93mh[0m in [93mvesicles[0m [93mvs[0m. [93m24[0m [93mh[0m in [93msolution[0m). To [93mour[0m [93msurprise[0m, a [93mdistinct[0m [93mdifference[0m in [93mproduct[0m [93mselectivity[0m between [93mOM[0m in [93msolution[0m and in [93mvesicles[0m was [93mobserved[0m in that the [93mintramolecular[0m [93mOM[0m is [93mmuch[0m [93mfavoured[0m in [93msolution[0m, while in [93mLUVs[0m, the [93mmain[0m [93mproducts[0m are the [93mresult[0m of [93mintermolecular[0m [93mOM[0m [93mreactions[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mresults[0m [93mprove[0m that [93mOM[0m is [93mreadily[0m [93mcatalysed[0m in [93mvesicles[0m and [93mindicate[0m that the [93mmilieu[0m of the [93mlipid[0m [93mbilayer[0m [93mhas[0m a [93mmajor[0m [93mimpact[0m on the [93mproduct[0m [93mselectivity[0m, [93mreaction[0m [93mtime[0m and [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversion[0m. - [93mDistinct[0m [93mhydrogen[0m [93matom[0m [93mtransfer[0m and [93mradical[0m [93mcapture[0m [93mreactivity[0m of [93mcopper[0m([93miii[0m) [93mOH[0m/[93mF[0m [93mcomplexes[0m [93menables[0m [93msite[0m-[93mselective[0m [93mC[0m([93msp[0m([93m3[0m))-[93mH[0m ([93m18[0m)[93mF[0m-[93mfluorination[0m.: [93mHigh[0m-[93mvalent[0m [93mmetal[0m [93mintermediates[0m [93mplay[0m a [93mkey[0m [93mrole[0m in [93mC[0m([93msp[0m [93m3[0m )-[93mH[0m [93mfunctionalization[0m [93mreactions[0m in [93mboth[0m [93menzymatic[0m [93mcatalysis[0m and [93morganometallic[0m [93mchemistry[0m. [93mDespite[0m its [93mgenerality[0m, this [93mstrategy[0m [93moften[0m [93mrequires[0m a [93msingle[0m [93mmetal[0m [93mcomplex[0m to [93mefficiently[0m [93mmediate[0m [93mboth[0m [93mhydrogen[0m [93matom[0m [93mtransfer[0m and [93mradical[0m [93mcapture[0m-a [93mcombination[0m [93mchallenging[0m to [93machieve[0m.
